channel.title: Some client help please
channel.description: so when i go to my stats, and i hover my mouse over them it shows the current level, next level and finally remainder but when i move down(basically hover my mouse over the next stat down, it moves closer to the edgeon the right, and when i get to the bottom i can't even see it. could someone help with that. kinda confusing but ask questions if you need to know more, REP ++
